requirementsV2.title: Create New Job Hunt
requirementsV2.subtitle: Fill out the information step by step to create your job hunt

basic.title: Basic Info
basic.heading: Basic Information
basic.subheading: Start by providing the essential details about the position you're hiring for.

location.title: Location & Salary
location.heading: Location & Compensation
location.subheading: Specify where the job is located and the compensation details.

details.title: Job Details
details.heading: Job Details
details.subheading: Provide detailed information about the role to attract the right candidates.

targeting.title: Targeting
targeting.heading: Candidate Targeting
targeting.subheading: Configure search preferences to find the most relevant candidates.

preview.title: Preview
preview.heading: Review Your Job Hunt
preview.subheading: Review all the details before activating your hunt. You can go back to any step to make changes.

jobTitle.label: Job Title
jobTitle.placeholder: e.g., Senior Software Engineer, Registered Nurse, Marketing Manager
jobTitle.description: What is the official title for this position? Be specific and clear.

professions.label: Professions
professions.description: Select one or more professions that best match this role. This helps us find relevant candidates.

specialization.label: Specialization
specialization.description: Optionally specify a specialization within the profession to narrow down the search.

workExperience.label: Required Work Experience (years)
workExperience.description: Minimum years of relevant work experience required for this position.

languages.label: Required Languages
languages.description: Select the languages candidates must be proficient in for this role.

city.label: City
city.description: Which city is the job located in?

region.label: State / Province / Region
region.description: Specify the state, province, or region (optional). Separate multiple with commas.

salaryRange.label: Salary Range
salaryRange.description: Provide a salary range to attract suitable candidates. Transparency helps!

salaryPeriod.label: Salary Period
salaryPeriod.description: How often is the salary paid?

salaryExtra.label: Additional Compensation Details
salaryExtra.placeholder: e.g., Performance bonuses, health insurance, 401k matching, commission structure...
salaryExtra.description: Any extra information about compensation (bonuses, benefits, commission, etc.)

jobDescription.label: Job Description
jobDescription.placeholder:
Describe the job role, main responsibilities, day-to-day tasks, team structure, growth opportunities, and what makes this role unique. Be detailed and engaging to attract top talent.

Example:
We're seeking a talented Senior Software Engineer to join our growing engineering team. You'll be working on cutting-edge projects that impact millions of users...

Key Responsibilities:
• Design and implement scalable backend services
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams
• Mentor junior developers
...
jobDescription.description: Describe the role, responsibilities, and what makes this opportunity exciting.

jobRequiredQualifications.label: Required Qualifications
jobRequiredQualifications.placeholder:
List the essential qualifications, certifications, skills, and experience candidates must have. Be specific but realistic.

Example:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
• 5+ years of professional software development experience
• Strong proficiency in Python and JavaScript
• Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
• Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
• Experience leading technical projects and mentoring others
...
jobRequiredQualifications.description: List the must-have skills, experience, and qualifications for this role.

preferredCountries.label: Preferred Countries
preferredCountries.description: Countries where you'd prefer to search for candidates. Candidates from these countries will be prioritized in search results.
preferredCountries.info: Selecting preferred countries helps us prioritize candidates from these locations, but we'll still search globally.

onlyCountries.label: Filter by Country
onlyCountries.description: Select specific countries to restrict your search. Leave empty to search globally.
onlyCountries.info: When no countries are selected, we search globally. Selecting specific countries will limit the search to only those locations.
onlyCountries.warning: Warning: Restricting to specific countries may significantly limit your candidate pool. Leave empty to search globally.

companyContext.label: Company Context
companyContext.placeholder:
Describe your company, industry, size, culture, values, mission, and what makes it a great place to work.

Example:
We're a fast-growing healthcare technology startup with 50+ employees across Europe. We're passionate about improving patient care through innovative software solutions. Our culture values work-life balance, continuous learning, and collaborative problem-solving...
companyContext.description: Provide context about your company that helps candidates understand your organization. This information helps our AI match you with candidates who align with your company culture.

hiringContext.label: Hiring Context
hiringContext.placeholder:
Explain why this position exists, team structure, growth opportunities, and what success looks like in this role.

Example:
We're expanding our engineering team to support our new product launch. The ideal candidate will work closely with our product and design teams to build features that will serve thousands of healthcare providers. This is a high-impact role with significant growth potential...
hiringContext.description: Explain why you're hiring and what the role means for your team. This helps us find candidates who are the right fit for this specific opportunity.

aiGenerate.title: AI assistance available!
aiGenerate.description: Click the "AI Generate" buttons to automatically create professional descriptions and qualifications based on the information you've provided. You can always edit the generated content to fit your needs.
aiGenerate.enableTip: Add a job title in the first step to enable AI generation

beSpecific.title: Tip: Be specific but not too restrictive
beSpecific.description: Providing clear details helps us match you with the right candidates, but being too restrictive might limit your candidate pool.

salaryTransparency.title: Salary transparency increases applications
salaryTransparency.description: Being upfront about compensation attracts more qualified candidates and saves time in the hiring process.

targeting.title: How targeting works
targeting.description: Our AI uses all the information you provide to find and rank candidates. Better targeting and context leads to better matches. Don't worry about being too specific - you can always adjust these settings later.

readyToActivate.title: Ready to activate!
readyToActivate.description: All required information has been provided. Click "Activate Hunt" to start finding candidates.

preview.potentialReachTooltipDescription: Number of candidates who match your job requirements
preview.reachDescription: candidates match your requirements and will be notified about this opportunity

errors.failedToActivate: Failed to activate hunt. Please try again.
errors.needActivePlan: You need an active plan to activate this hunt
